roleset.name: act in combination to increase an effect

example.name: all arguments
example.text: In contrast, IL-1, which activates only the NF-IL6 pathway, synergizes with heat shock to produce strong activation of hsp90.
example.arg: IL-1, which activates only the NF-IL6 pathway
to produce strong activation of hsp90

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2 - transitive use
example.text: However, acephate strongly synergized the activity of fenpropathrin (Dennehy et al. 1995).
